title: Love Sick - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai
author: INDRYTIMES
description: The music club president is in deep trouble when he finds out that his clubs budget was cut by 20,000 bucks, forcing him to march into the student council room to find some help. Luckily, he finds his (not so close) friend, the student council secretary, and says he will do anything for his help. Well, get ready lad, you're in for a LOOOOOOONG ride.>
